name: Rat King Court
description:
Hope you like our rat-game.

Completed over the weekend for the Kiwi Game Jam.

Started late and finished late (what's a deadline????).

HTML for in browser play or  ROM if you're fancy and would like to use an emulator or GameBoy cart (with SD card, also please make it black and white and not the GameBoy colour colours, thanks).

Controls:

Z - Next/Select

Arrow Keys - Rat-hand navigation (sometimes the Rat-hand goes invisible, try moving up a bit)

By Sam Baker & Nate Tamblyn

Thanks to Sam Duncan for ideas and u/valdezv666 for the music!
